attributes.action: deliberate further over the future of The Vale of Berkeley College...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In response to the Badman report...we believe that The Vale of Berkeley College should be allowed a future: at the heart of its community. Bringing a sense of justice and fairness to the proceedings.

rejection.details: This is a matter for local government. Please contact your local MP.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
